name: The Snow White Pinapple Vessel
shortDescription: In the Snow White Pineapple Vessel is an unscented candle ... however, while unscented the soft scent of coconut is present ... this is a perfect candle for the dinner table!
fullDescription: This is finished with a tiny Rose Quartz & a shimmer of Peal Mika Powder. The Rose Quartz is a Romance stone and works in the Heart Chakra. It brings Calm & Peace, Love & Compassion, adds Loving energy to relationships.
title: The Snow White Pinapple Vessel
text: In the Snow White Pineapple Vessel is an unscented candle ... however, while unscented the soft scent of coconut is present ... this is a perfect candle for the dinner table!

posts.text: It is nice to see the creativity of women

name: The Copper Gold Pineapple Vessel
shortDescription: In the Copper Gold Pineapple Vessel has a Cardamon scent which gives off a handsomely woody undertone. This is finished with a tiny Citrine stone & a shimmer of Gold Mika Powder.
fullDescription: The Citrine Gem is a Creativity stone and works in the Sacral Chakra. It encourages Motivation, Self Expression & Self Improvement.
title: The Copper Gold Pineapple Vessel
text: In the Copper Gold Pineapple Vessel has a Cardamon scent which gives off a handsomely woody undertone.

posts.text: It is nice to see the creativity of women
